title: Supreme Court strikes out Osun’s withheld LG allocations suit, but faults FG's funds seizure
description: While the Supreme Court struck out the Osun State Government's suit, it held that the federal government was wrong to the seize the funds belonging to the local government areas of the state.
content:
The Supreme Court on Friday struck out a suit filed by the Osun State Governmentover the withheld allocations of its 30 local government areas.
The court, in a 6-1 majority decision of its seven-mem… [+2019 chars]
